title: People Who Don't Communicate in Ranked

replies.body:
Hi,

What is this post exactly posted around?
I can see your title, But you do not clarify.

If you are wondering "what do I do?" when "People who Don't Communicate in ranked"
Then Please Specify.

But If so, Then you should Try to make contact.
Chat & Pings. 
Just keep trying and don't hesitate too Let them know as they might be listening.

-RedPandaFox
